page.title: 02Collecting Information
page.content: In activities week we went on a coach to Oulton Broad and went to people's doors and asked them questions from our questionaire sheets.On the Matters of Local Interest sheet we asked people in our area about local,British and world wide problems,we also asked if they knew of any local ghosts,food delicacies and customs. The Local Amenity Questionaire asked if people were happy with the Educational arrangments,bus and train services ,Entertainment,health and sports facilities. The BBC survey sheet asked about the persons life,hobbies,smoking and drinking habbits. We also had a building count,children went out and counted the buildings and the different types of building.
